# If the Java System property 'kms.log.dir' is not defined at KMS start up time # Setup sets its value to '${kms.home}/logs'
log4j.appender.kms=org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender log4j.appender.kms.DatePattern='.'yyyy-MM-dd log4j.appender.kms.File=${kms.log.dir}/kms.log log4j.appender.kms.Append=true log4j.appender.kms.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.kms.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{ISO8601} %-5p %c{1} - %m%n log4j.appender.kms.MaxFileSize={{ranger_kms_log_maxfilesize}}MB

log4j.logger.kms-audit=INFO, kms-audit log4j.additivity.kms-audit=false
